Key Match Events: The match went to a penalty shootout after a 1-1 draw in extra time.
DR Congo won 8-7 in the penalty shootout to advance to the quarterfinals.
Post-Match Reflections: DR Congo's coach Kaba Diawara expressed pride in the win and the team's growth over the past two years.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant as it marked DR Congo's first knockout win since 1976.
Others: The article also covered Guinea's late win over Equatorial Guinea, which was a separate match in the same tournament.
